eu.slipo.athenarc.triplegeo.utils

Interface ReverseConverter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RdfToCsv, RdfToGeoJson, RdfToShp

    public interface ReverseConverter
    Reverse Conversion Interface for TripleGeo used in reconstructing (relational) records from an RDF graph.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Kostas Patroumpas

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close()
        Closes output file, once all results have been written.

      • createSchema

        boolean createSchema(java.util.List<java.lang.String> attrList,
                     org.apache.jena.query.QuerySolution sol)
        Determines schema with all attribute names and their respective data types.
        Parameters:
        attrList - List of attribute names.
        sol - A single result (record) from a SELECT query in SPARQL.
        Returns:
        True if attribute schema has been created successfully; otherwise, False.

      • getGeometrySpec

        java.lang.String getGeometrySpec(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Literal g)
        Identifies SRID (EPSG code) and geometry type from a WKT literal. Applicable in reverse transformation into shapefile format.
        Parameters:
        g - A geometry WKT literal.
        Returns:
        A string that concatenates the geometry type and the SRID of the given WKT literal.

      • getGeometrySpec

        java.lang.String getGeometrySpec(java.lang.String g)
        Identifies SRID (EPSG code) and geometry type from a WKT string. Applicable in reverse transformation into CSV format.
        Parameters:
        g - A geometry WKT string.
        Returns:
        An extended WKT (EWKT) representation, which includes the SRID.

      • getGeometry

        com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry getGeometry(java.lang.String g)
        Identifies SRID (EPSG code) and geometry type from a WKT literal. Applicable in reverse transformation into GeoJson format.
        Parameters:
        g - A geometry WKT literal.
        Returns:

      • store

        java.lang.Integer store(java.util.List<java.lang.String> attrList,
                        java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> results)
        Creates a feature collection from current batch of records and writes them into the output file.
        Parameters:
        attrList - List of attribute names.
        results - Collection of records in the current batch.
        Returns:
        The number of records resulted in the current batch.
